company.name: Medecins Sans Frontieres-Operational Center Amsterdam/Artsen Zonder Grenzen Nederland

profile_positions.company: Medecins Sans Frontieres-Operational Center Amsterdam/Artsen Zonder Grenzen Nederland
profile_positions.description:
- To lead, provide direction, and coordinate the activities of the Logistics department and ensure efficiency, transparency and accountability.
- To formulate the short and long term vision, goals and strategies with regard to supply chain management and logistics and technical support.
- To ensure pertinence and reinforce the effectiveness of the supply chain, logistical services and technical support capabilities, to facilitate the implementation of the Operational (medical humanitarian) ambitions outlined in the OCA Strategic Plan (SP).
- To provide strong leadership dedicated to fostering a cohesive and collaborative working environment underpinned by MSF’s mission and values.
Accountable for the delivery of relevant and effective supply chain and logistical/technical support services to the OCA medical humanitarian operations and for the assigned departmental resources.
- Oversees the Logistics department’s strategic direction and ensures alignment with the overall strategic framework of OCA.
- Formulates vision, goals and strategies and ensures effective strategic guidance, policies and processes, standards and guidelines are in place to support effective implementation.
- Formulates and ensures implementation of the Logistics department’s Functional Strategy in line with the Strategic Plan and MSF's overarching goals and strategies.
- Drives transformation and change by effectively communicating vision and rationale for change, supporting animated engagement, and ensuring inclusive processes.
- Develops strategic, tactical and operational collaboration with regard to the supply chain and logistics and technical support services and activities with other MSF sections, with a view of enhancing synergies, efficient decision-making and effective, high quality service provision.
profile_positions.title: Director of Supply & Logistics

company.name: MSF-Operational Center Amsterdam/Artsen Zonder Grenzen Nederland

profile_positions.company: MSF-Operational Center Amsterdam/Artsen Zonder Grenzen Nederland
profile_positions.title: Head of Operational Logistics & Field Supply Support

company.name: Medecins Sans Frontieres-Operational Center Amsterdam/Artsen Zonder Grenzen Nederland

profile_positions.description:
- To safeguard the quality, relevance and timeliness of operational logistics support to Operations.
- Monitoring of the impact and quality of logistics/technical support to MSF medical projects and designing improvement plans where required.
- Providing expert advice to Operations and Logistics management for decision-making on operational logistics issues.
- Developing the unit’s objectives and annual activity plans including the necessary human and financial resources, and executes approved plans.
- Coordination the workload division, including resource planning of flying field support staff.
- Line management of the Logistics Advisors Field Support (Front Offices - operational cells & emergency desk) and flying technical/supply support staff.
- Direct field support to the missions in Afghanistan & Pakistan.
profile_positions.title: Operational Logistics Coordinator, Medecins Sans Frontieres - Operational Centre Amsterdam

profile_positions.description:
- To support missions logistic activities in Afghanistan, Bangladesh, Kenya, Pakistan, South Sudan, Uganda, Yemen, Liberia, Ivory Coast, Haiti.
- Responsible for implementation of the operational logistics policies (development, research, introduction, implementation and continuous improvement of logistics and technical processes). 
- Responsible for providing logistics and technical support to the project countries in certain portfolio. 
- Maintains and develops the quality, efficiency and availability of logistical/technical knowledge in order to be able to support and advice field staff. 
- Supports HRM processes and participate in trainings of logistics field staff.
profile_positions.title: FSU Logistics Advisor (Front Officer), Medecins Sans Frontieres - Operational Centre Amsterdam

profile_positions.description: Coordination of Field Support Unit (Logistics Department) - a team of 15 people consisting of Back/Front Office specialists/advisors and 6 Flying specialists based in MSF-OCA offices (Amsterdam & Berlin). FSU is responsible for the development and implementation of technical, logistical, supply chain management standards (policies, protocols, products and the management frameworkand), and direct logistical support (supervision, trainings, consultancy visits) of the field missions of MSF-OCA.
profile_positions.title: Interim Coordinator, Field Support Unit, Logistics Department

profile_positions.description:
- To ensure the logistic activities of MSF mission in Uzbekistan including project in Nukus (MDR-TB treatment) and Tashkent Coordination office.
- To ensure the logistic activities of MSF mission in Turkmenistan including projects in Magdanly city and Ashgabat Coordination office.
- Standard responsibilities of MSF-OCA Logistical Coordinator of Mission
profile_positions.title: Logistical Coordinator of MSF-OCA Mission in Uzbekistan & Turkmenistan

profile_positions.description:
- To ensure the logistic activities of MSF mission in Pakistan including projects in Kurram Agency (Federally Administrated Tribal Areas), Peshawar, Quetta, Chaman, East Balochistan and Islamabad Coordination office.
- To ensure the logistic activities of MSF mission in Turkmenistan including projects in Magdanly city and Ashgabat Coordination office.
- Standard responsibilities of MSF-OCA Logistical Coordinator of Mission.
profile_positions.title: Logistical Coordinator of MSF-OCA Missions in Pakistan & Turkmenistan

profile_positions.description:
- To ensure mission activities of MSF mission in Pakistan (Standard responsibilities of Head of Mission).
- Worked as Interim Hom in periods of Dec, 2007;   Feb, 2008;   May, 2008, Jul, 2008.
profile_positions.title: Interim Head of Mission

profile_positions.description: - To ensure the logistic activities of MSF mission in Pakistan including projects in Kashmir (Hattian, Lamnian, Leepa, Muzaffarabd, Cholera Treatment Centres), Peshawar, Quetta and Islamabad Coordination office.
profile_positions.title: Logistical Coordinator of MSFH-Pakistan Mission

profile_positions.description:
- To organize the complex of the different logistics activities to ensure the fast earthquake response of MSF teams in affected areas of Pakistani Kashmir during the first weeks after the earthquake.
- To ensure responsibility/authority for the quality & appropriateness of logistics/watsan organisation & implementation of MSF-H response activities in Northern Pakistan. To organize the logistical support to the emergency medical teams in mountains.
- To organize the urgent delivery and distribution of non-food items (tents, cooking sets, plastic sheeting, blankets, construction kits, etc.) among the population affected by the strongest earthquake in Kashmir – Muzaffarabad, Hattian, Lamnian, Leepa, Kai Manja, Saidpur and other valleys.
- To ensure a timely and efficient supply of all medical and non-medical material. To establish and arrange Supply Management system in emergency mission.
profile_positions.title: Logistics Coordinator of MSFH-Pakistan North (Kashmir) Earthquake Emergency Response Mission

profile_positions.description:
- To ensure mission activities of MSF mission in Turkmenistan (Standard responsibilities of Head of Mission).
- Interim Head of Mission in periods of May – June, 2006;    July, 2007;   Mar –  Apr, 2008.
profile_positions.title: Interim Head of Mission

profile_positions.company: Medecins Sans Frontieres-Operational Center Amsterdam/Artsen Zonder Grenzen Nederland
profile_positions.description:
- Ensure an effective and efficient administrative, logistics, human resources and financial management according to respective guidelines, policies and legislation. Provide support to the project sites within Central Asia, Afghanistan and Pakistan. Serve as MSF Country Representative.
- To ensure proper levels of support to the MSF project sites within Turkmenistan as well MSF projects within Central Asia and Afghanistan/Pakistan.
- Ensure Logistic Systems are maintained and procurement of orders is fulfilled. Ensuring fast efficient transport of humanitarian cargoes from Ashgabat to their end locations.
profile_positions.title: Manager of the Ashgabat Logistics Support Office, Country Representative

profile_positions.description: Responsible for the day-to-day administration of the TTTF’s office and provide logistics support; review periodical reports and prepare recommendations for action by the TTTF. Responsible for organizing the tournaments, negotiations with international federations, representing TTTF abroad; Interpretation and translation as required.
profile_positions.title: Secretary General/Executive Director

profile_positions.description:
- Develop a strategy for the sport and commercial development of the company and responsible for its implementation;
- Supervise the office managerial, financial and sport duties of the first table tennis club in country.
profile_positions.title: Director of Table Tennis Club “NISA”

company.name: Institute of Physiology, TKM Academy of Medical Sciences/Institute of Molecular Biology,Russian AS

profile_positions.company: Institute of Physiology, TKM Academy of Medical Sciences/Institute of Molecular Biology,Russian AS
profile_positions.description:
- Researched on molecular mechanisms of adaptation of an organism to hyperthermia & heat shock proteins (stress proteins) and genes from various climate- and geographically dependent areas. The theme of degree work was "Comparative characteristics of cellular heat shock reactions in different organisms inhabiting arid regions". 
- Led joint investigations with Moscow Institute of Molecular Biology.
profile_positions.title: Researcher/Post-Graduate Student (Biochemistry & Molecular Biology)
